alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:57PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Stone and central Searcy Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1057 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Watts, or near Marshall, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Thola... Marsena... Kay... Imo... Elberta... Watts... Leslie... Big Flat... Zach... Alco... Canaan... Morning Star... Cozahome... Landis... Snowball... Lone Pine... Harriet... Oxley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Stone
